name: Contract kickoff
description: Legal receives request to contract for a customer, reviews material, checks if a "Master Service Agreement" or MSA is in place, or seeks to review the current one. Post creation of an MSA, the same process is carried out for a "Statement of Work" or SOW for the services or goods that need to be provided/sold to the customer.

name: First pass contract review
description: Legal reviews a Master Service Agreement, communicating with clauses that need further validation with other teams, communicates with customer's legal team on terms.

name: MSA Contract iteration
description: Legal iterates with stakeholders on clarifications received from customer for finalizing contract.

name: Legal finalization and MSA execution
description: Legal finalizes the contract for the MSA via a digital signature between required parties

name: SOW kickoff and Order form creation
description: An order form is set up which is reviewed to check if the right MSA is referenced and other terms are referenced. SOWs are set up post this for every 'service' or 'goods' to be sold to the customer.

name: SOW iteration
description: The terms of the SOW are iterated with the customer.

name: Legal finalization and SOW execution
description: Legal finalizes the contract for the SOW via a digital signature between required parties and passes on to sales ops for updates in the CRM as an "opportunity".

name: Contract updates and forwarding for Finance Approval
description: Sales Ops team updates the opportunity in the CRM with all relevant contract details. They add purchase order (PO) details and pass the contract on to Finance team for approval

name: Financial review of contract
description: Finance team receives request to review the contract on the CRM, validates the terms and details including the PO details and approves / rejects it as expected.

name: Invoice creation
description: Create a new invoice in the accounting application to be raised to the customer updating details according to the PO

name: Invoice dispatch
description: The invoice created for receiving monies is forwarded to the customer (typically by email or a customer portal)

name: Payment collection
description: Payment received from the customer is recorded in the accounting application. An 'aging report' is created to maintain a record of outstanding payments.

name: Revenue accounting
description: Generate / update revenue records in the reporting file, including received payments, new customer contracts etc.

name: Purchase Order creation
description: Finance team seeks budget approval for a purchase requisition (PR) and creates a Purchase Order (PO), passing it on for approval.

name: Vendor Onboarding
description: Finance team creates records for a vendor and updates relevant details in the accounting application.

name: Invoice processing
description: When an invoice is received, Finance team reviews it against the raised PO and then forwards it for approval from relevant stakeholders.

name: Invoice accounting
description: Extract approved invoice details and compute tax / other details and prepare a payment working sheet.

name: Invoice payment
description: Schedule the invoice for payment, and post payment send the payment advice to the vendor. Update relevant payment records in the accounting tool.

name: Job Creation
description: Create a new job or copy an existing job and update it in the recruiting portal. Chiefly, the job description must be updated.

name: Candidate sourcing and screening
description: Update a received resume from a job application for a job in the recruiting portal, screen the resume for fitment and forward to interviewing stage.

name: Monthly leave reporting
description: Download employee leave record information from the people management portal. Verify the details in the report and adjust against prior month reports. Publish the report for compliance checks.

name: Employment record reporting
description: Download employment records from the people management portal. Match against the employee exit records and create a consolidated view.

name: Employee offboarding
description: Process an exit request for an employee, notify requisite departments for managing access records for the employee, generate a relieving and resignation letter

name: Employment letter generation
description: Generate a letter in a fixed template certifying employment details and updating the same in the template. Sign the document using digital signature.
